message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product would be highly beneficial to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm confident this product offers you significant value beyond that price. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still aiming to stay within my budget. I'm willing to increase my offer to $12,500.
